video.title: Ocean Mysteries with Jeff Corwin
video.synopsis: Based at the world's largest aquarium in Georgia, Jeff takes viewers around the globe to meet experts and explore Earth's least understood resource.

episodes.synopsis: Jeff races to California to unlock the secrets behind a marine mammal disaster and work with biologists to help rescue starving sea lion pups.
episodes.title: California Sea Lions

episodes.synopsis: Jeff visits the secret world of endangered sea lions, discovers birds who mate for life and meets a colony of baby penguins and their devoted parents.
episodes.title: Animal Families of New Zealand

episodes.synopsis: Jeff returns to his native coastline and gets close to a nest of wild bald eagles, learns about red belly turtles and visits an island full of terns.
episodes.title: New England Animal Adventures

episodes.synopsis: Jeff relives some of his most memorable moments at the Georgia Aquarium, including a dramatic stingray transfer and a dive with injured veterans.
episodes.title: Best of: Adventures at the Aquarium

episodes.synopsis: Jeff visits a New Zealand eco-sanctuary that protects a lost world of ancient reptiles, flightless birds and massive insects in the heart of a city.
episodes.title: Zealandia: The Garden of Tane

episodes.synopsis: At Grand Cayman Island, Jeff explores Stingray City, home to hundreds of massive rays and thousands of tourists eager for a spectacular encounter.
episodes.title: Stingray City

episodes.synopsis: Jeff dives deep in Hawaii and explores a diverse ecosystem using the latest technology, experiencing the underwater world like never before.
episodes.title: Dive into Hawaii

episodes.synopsis: Jeff recalls adventures with a special group of marine mammals in various habitats, including harbor seals, sea lions, elephant seals and monk seals.
episodes.title: Best of the Pinnipeds

episodes.synopsis: Jeff uncovers the hidden world of Steller sea lions in Vancouver and helps answer critical questions that could one day save the species.
episodes.title: Secrets of Sea Lions

episodes.synopsis: Jeff recalls memorable adventures with hundreds of stingrays in the Caribbean, thousands of sea terns in Cape Cod and mighty grizzly bears in Alaska.
episodes.title: Best of Island Adventures

episodes.synopsis: Jeff rushes to the tropics to help save endangered coral. Diving into the dark ocean after midnight, he witnesses the wonder of coral spawning.
episodes.title: The Endangered Coral of Curacao

episodes.synopsis: Jeff works with rescuers fighting to save sea turtles and explores the tropical paradise to find coral reefs, stingrays and schools of hungry sharks.
episodes.title: Exploration Tahiti

episodes.synopsis: Jeff boards a submarine to hunt for an elusive and destructive species, trying to remove the invaders from the ocean before they damage the ecosystem.
episodes.title: The Hunt for Lionfish

episodes.synopsis: Jeff joins a research team to discover the effects of sound pollution on whales, racing the 30-ton creatures and exploring the latest science.
episodes.title: Whale Sounds

episodes.synopsis: Jeff encounters a family of humpback whales and witnesses the special bond between a protective mother and her precocious calf.
episodes.title: Humpback Whales of Tahiti

episodes.synopsis: Jeff recalls favorite underwater experiences, including a free dive with whales, Hawaiian adventures and riding in a submersible far below the waves.
episodes.title: Underwater Adventures

episodes.synopsis: Jeff explores one of Earth's most diverse ecosystems in French Polynesia, encountering sharks, sea turtles, dolphins and more on a mesmerizing dive.
episodes.title: Dive into Paradise

episodes.synopsis: Jeff travels to a seabird rescue and rehabilitation center during breeding season and joins an effort to save a group of orphaned penguin chicks.
episodes.title: Saving African Penguins

episodes.synopsis: Jeff and an international team of biologists explore the mysterious world of sharks, coming face-to-face with predators that live far below the waves.
episodes.title: Hawaii Shark Encounter

episodes.synopsis: Jeff goes to Botswana to help protect one of the largest predators on earth. He discovers nests, explores habitat threats and even catches crocodiles.
episodes.title: Nile Crocodiles

episodes.synopsis: Jeff visits a village in Botswana threatened by deadly snakes. While relocating the vipers deep in the wilderness, he is attacked by a spitting cobra.
episodes.title: The Snakes of Southern Africa

episodes.synopsis: Jeff travels to southern Africa's largest wetland habitat and encounters endangered animals that migrate hundreds of miles to the life-giving water.
episodes.title: African Safari

episodes.synopsis: Jeff visits a koala conservation center and helps an injured resident, aids a group of little blue penguins and meets a family of stingrays.
episodes.title: Cute Critters of Australia

episodes.synopsis: In a vast African wetlands, Jeff encounters great herds of elephants, lagoons full of deadly hippos, snakes living in the trees and exotic birds.
episodes.title: The Okavango Delta

episodes.synopsis: Jeff connects with giant bats after a heat wave threatens their survival, feeding hundreds of babies and helping an injured bat return to the wild.
episodes.title: The Flying Foxes of Australia

episodes.synopsis: Jeff travels to Australia in search of the ocean's most poisonous snakes and visits Tasmania to learn about a deadly but misunderstood reptile.
episodes.title: The Secrets of Venom
